name: Bulls On Parade
description:
After finding out that your friends have all been slaughtered, you go on a rampage to fight back against the butchers. Just don't let them cut you up!

Small arcade-esque game made for the MiniLD 72 - Elympics (and first ever published game - yay!). Basically used this as an excuse to teach myself Unity and experience a mini game jam. You should find the leader-board somewhere over at https://dollarone.games/elympics/leaderboards.html

Controls can be found in-game.

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • BeepBox
  • GIMP
  • Bfxr
